Overview: This course serves as a general introduction to research methods and CS research more specifically. Students will understand how to conduct, analyze, and communicate research in a variety of CS domains. Students will develop their own independent research in the form of a group written literature review and an independent research proposal.
Course Goals: To demonstrate mastery of the goals above, students will be able to do the following:
Students will need to be familiar with how to write in word processers and be able to learn how to write in structured markdown document editors (LaTeX). Resources will be provided on how to write in LateX.
Academic Integrity: All Georgia Tech students are expected to uphold theGeorgia Tech Academic Honor Code. This course may impose additional academic integrity stipulations; consult the official course documentation for more information.
